title: Addressing Inequities in US Housing
itunes:title: Addressing Inequities in US Housing
description:
Gina Merritt, Principal at Northern Real Estate Urban Ventures, discusses the $40 million grant program Growing Diverse Housing Developers.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
